translations: v.着色（color 的 ing 形式）；出现颜色
n.着色；着色剂；配色；天然色；外貌

sentences.sentence: Not only the coloring genes, but lots of other genes are getting mixed up, too.
sentences.translation: 不仅是染色基因，还有很多其他基因也混在一起了。

sentences.sentence: What we did in our ancestry was to produce more permanent natural coloring in our skin cells.
sentences.translation: 我们祖先所做的是在我们的皮肤细胞中产生更持久的天然色素。

sentences.sentence: Add four drops of red food coloring to the water above the hot cup and four drops of blue food coloring to the water above the cold cup.
sentences.translation: 从热杯子上方向水中加四滴红色食用色素，从冷杯子上方往水中加四滴蓝色食用色素。
